Package itn.selfsearch.map

Class MapTemplate

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
itn.selfsearch.map.MapTemplate
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
MapEditor, ProductLocator
public abstract class MapTemplate
extends javax.swing.JPanel
Abstract class defining common methods used by GUI panels containing maps. Uses the Observer design pattern.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • saveMapData

      public java.lang.String saveMapData()
      Method to save the current contents of the map grid to a string.
      Returns:
      The contents of the map grid as a string.

    • addMapSaveListener

      public void addMapSaveListener​(javax.swing.event.ChangeListener newListener)
      Method used to register a listener for saving a map. Used to notify the database when a map class wants to save a map to the database.
      Parameters:
      newListener - an input listener

    • loadMapData

      public void loadMapData​(java.lang.String mapData)
      Method to load a saved map in the map editor.
      Parameters:
      mapData - String containing data used to load an existing map.

    • addMapLoadListener

      public void addMapLoadListener​(javax.swing.event.ChangeListener newListener)
      Method used to register a listener for loading a map. Used to notify the database when a map class wants to load a map from the database.
      Parameters:
      newListener - an input listener

    • registerTile

      protected abstract void registerTile​(int x, int y)
      Method to register the current panel as the owner of a grid tile, allowing the panel to be notified when the grid tile is clicked. The subclasses override this method to define what happens when the panel is notified.
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the grid tile.
      y - The y coordinate of the grid tile.
